frame.name: Manipulate_into_shape
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> manipulates a <fen>Theme</fen> so that it ends up in a particular shape or configuration denoted by a <fen>Resultant_configuration</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">She</fex> <t>molded</t> <fex name="Theme">the playdough</fex> <fex name="Resultant_configuration">into a ball</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the volitional actor who manipulates the <fen>Theme</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>Where the manipulation of the <fen>Theme</fen> takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the manipulation of the <fen>Theme</fen> takes place. </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>When the manipulation of the <fen>Theme</fen> takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> by which the manipulation of the <fen>Theme</fen> takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the manipulation of the <fen>Theme</fen> takes place.
</def-root>

FE.name: Theme
FE.definition: <def-root>The object which is manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> into a particular shape.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the manipulation of the <fen>Theme</fen> takes place.
<ex>John <t>coiled</t> the wire <fex name="Manr">tightly</fex> around the spool.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Locus
FE.definition:
<def-root>Where the manipulation of the <fen>Theme</fen> takes place.
<ex>Kelly <t>wound</t> the laces <fex name="Locus">around the back of her heel</fex> to combat loose shoes.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Resultant_configuration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The shape or configuration of the <fen>Theme</fen> after being manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">He</fex> <t>twisted</t> <fex name="Theme">the wire</fex> <fex name="Resultant_configuration">into a hook</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: wind.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: put a long, thin object into a roughly circular configuration, often by encircling another object.

lexUnit.name: loop.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: arrange an object into a loop or a shape approximating a loop.

lexUnit.name: coil.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: make into a coiled shape.

lexUnit.name: mold.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: To cause to change shape.

lexUnit.name: roll (into).v
lexUnit.definition: FN: To roll a Theme against a surface to create a new shape or configuration.
